Title: Frozen Yoghurt
Writer: Simon Blackwell (teleplay), Armando Iannucci (teleplay), Simon Blackwell (story), Armando Iannucci (creator)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: The Veep's office is revived by good news that her task force is likely to be green lit. With the President (conveniently) out of the country, Selina looks to make headway on filibuster reform and meeting with some 'normal' people.
